field.name: campuses
field.label: Valid Campuses
field.description: One per line, url-var=Translation String. url-val is pass in url via multicampus=url-var

field.name: hideShowCss
field.label: Publish CSS
field.description: Publish css for 'multicampushide-url-var' and 'multicampusshow-url-var'. 'multicampushide-url-var' hides the element for that campus. 'multicampusshow-url-var' hides the element for all other campuses.

field.name: redirectPublished
field.label: Redirect Publish URLs
field.description: Joomla doesn't pass External URL or Menu Item Alias types to the plugin to check for alternate urls. We can get around this by setting the urls an External URL menu item then using a redirect in Joomla's default Redirect component.
